author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE ERIN LOCATED JUST EAST OF THE SOUTHEAST BAHAMAS... ...LIFE-THREATENING SURF AND RIP CURRENTS LIKELY ACROSS THE U.S. EASTERN SEABOARD THIS WEEK...
summary: ...CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE ERIN LOCATED JUST EAST OF THE SOUTHEAST BAHAMAS... ...LIFE-THREATENING SURF AND RIP CURRENTS LIKELY ACROSS THE U.S. EASTERN SEABOARD THIS WEEK... As of 5:00 AM EDT Mon Aug 18 the center of Erin was located near 22.8, -70.2 with movement NW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 945 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
